sub_topic: Calculation of Carnot efficiency of a heat engine
message_1: A Carnot engine operates between two reservoirs with temperatures of 500 K and 300 K respectively. Calculate the maximum efficiency of the engine.
message_2:
The maximum efficiency of a Carnot engine is given by the formula:

Efficiency = 1 - (Tc/Th)

where Tc is the temperature of the cold reservoir and Th is the temperature of the hot reservoir. In this case, Tc = 300 K and Th = 500 K.

Efficiency = 1 - (300 K / 500 K)
Efficiency = 1 - 0.6
Efficiency = 0.4

The maximum efficiency of the Carnot engine operating between these two reservoirs is 40%.
